translations: n.[有化]低聚物（oligomer 的复数）；[化学]寡聚物

phrs.translation: 聚物, 齐聚物, 低聚物
花青素, 四聚体称为低聚体, 寡聚体, 低聚原花青素

sentences.sentence: Resveratrol and its oligomers may help to explain the health benefits of red wine
sentences.translation: 白藜芦醇及其寡聚物可能能够解释红酒的保健作用

sentences.sentence: Glycidol oligomers structurally belong to line polylol polyether, and can directly act as thickener, moisturizing and so on.
sentences.translation: 环氧丙醇低(齐)聚物结构上属于低分子量的多元醇线型聚醚，可直接用作增稠剂、保湿剂等。

sentences.sentence: The effect of active monomers, oligomers and couple agent on shear strength and volume shrinkage of UV-curing adhesive was investigated.
sentences.translation: 考察了活性单体、预聚体及偶联剂对紫外光固化胶粘剂的粘接强度、体积收缩的影响。
